reviewComments: Great place to see and learn about the greatest generation. Wonderful exhibits and many aircraft. Rides are available also.
This museum shows the integrity and honor our troops deserve. I have taken both students and my son here.
see a number of used WWII planes - some now still in action. Get a tour from the knowledgeable volunteers there. Other interesting things re WWII too.
